| A boojum:* can [fly](/wiki/Fly "Fly").
* is an [animal](/wiki/Animal "Animal").
* can [see invisible creatures](/wiki/See_invisible "See invisible").
* is [carnivorous](/wiki/Carnivore "Carnivore").
* is not a valid [polymorphable](/wiki/Polymorph "Polymorph") form.
* is normally generated [hostile](/wiki/Hostile "Hostile").
* is [strong](/wiki/Strong "Strong").
* can be seen through [infravision](/wiki/Infravision "Infravision"). |                                                                                                                    |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    |                                                                                                                    |
| **[Reference](/wiki/Source_code "Source code")**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   | [monst.c#line1651](https://github.com/remirol/sporkhack/blob/033dcc3893f029d1a07016ff0a1603893c95d8e0/src/monst.c) |

Boojums are [SporkHack](/wiki/SporkHack "SporkHack") and [EvilHack](/wiki/EvilHack "EvilHack") monsters which are only found when a [snark](/wiki/Snark "Snark") reveals itself to be one. One of its attacks can teleport the player across the map much like a [quantum mechanic](/wiki/Quantum_mechanic "Quantum mechanic").
html:
Boojum

From NetHackWiki
Jump to navigation Jump to search
J boojum ?
Attacks bite 3d10, claw 3d10, claw 3d10, claw teleport
J boojum ?
Attacks

bite 3d10, claw 3d10, claw 3d10, claw teleport

Base level 18

Speed 15
Base AC 0
Base MR 90
Alignment 0 (neutral)
Frequency (by normal means) 0 (Not randomly generated)
Genocidable No
Weight 400
Nutritional value 200
Size large
Resistances fire, shock, disintegration
Resistances conveyed fire, shock, disintegration

A boojum:

  • can fly.
  • is an animal.
  • can see invisible creatures.
  • is carnivorous.
  • is not a valid polymorphable form.
  • is normally generated hostile.
  • is strong.
  • can be seen through infravision.
Reference monst.c#line1651

Boojums are SporkHack and EvilHack monsters which are only found when a snark reveals itself to be one. One of its attacks can teleport the player across the map much like a quantum mechanic.

Retrieved from "https://nethackwiki.com/index.php?title=Boojum&oldid=148152"

Boojums are [[SporkHack]] and [[EvilHack]] monsters which are only found when a [[snark]] reveals itself to be one. One of its attacks can teleport the player across the map much like a [[quantum mechanic]].
